head.title: Coronavirus and Remote Learning - Grandville Public Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Known for its committed faculty, Grandville Public Schools has been serving K-12 students for more than a century. Welcome!

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Grandville Public Schools, Grandville Schools, Grandville Bulldogs, Grandville Public School District, remote learning, distance learning, learning at home

img.alt: Collage of the front exteriors of nine brick schools
students wear goggles in chemistry while combining solutions in glass protective area

div.p: If you can dream it, you can do it. Grandville graduates have the skills to be responsible, contributing citizens in a changing world.

img.alt: parents outside with son by fence in backyard
5 teachers stand by big G outside of school
marching band brass instrument players on field

div.p: Our art and music classes begin as early as kindergarten.

img.alt: Athletic entrance with glass and blue night sky

div.p: Our athletics program ranks among the top 5% in Michigan per Niche.

img.alt: A collage of photos of teachers.

div.p: Our teachers & staff are here to help.

div.div: On April 2, 2020, Gov. Whitmer signed an executive order suspending in-person instruction and closing school buildings for the remainder of this school year. School sports activities and in-person extracurricular school activities are suspended while any state of emergency or state of disaster prompted by COVID-19 is in effect. Treehouse daycare is also closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year; stay tuned for more information about the start date of Summer Treehouse.

Our schools may be closed, but our learning continues! Below are some of the sites and tools our teachers will use to communicate with you. Our structured distance learning began April 15 and ends May 29. You may always email your teacher if you get lost.

a.title: GMS Remote Learning Information for Parents

div.div: Our free curbside food service will continue as scheduled below because it is considered a critical function. Sorry, a menu is not available ahead of time for our breakfast & lunch sacks due to frequent changes in item availability.
